properties.entry: select sec.category_id as id , sec.name as text,sec.fullname , sec.parent_id, (select 1 from sc_ebay_category s1 where s1.parent_id = sec.category_id limit 0,1 ) as hasChildren from sc_ebay_category sec where parent_id = '{@#parentId#}'

INSERT INTO sc_ebay_template (ID, SITE, CONDITIONID, LISTINGTYPE, CURRENCY, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTIDVAL, PRIMARYCATEGORY, PRIMARYCATEGORYTEXT, ATTRIBUTE, SECONDARYCATEGORY, SECONDARYCATEGORYTEXT, ATTRIBUTE2, ITEMTITLE, SUBTITLE, QUANTITY, LOTSIZE, LISTINGDURATION, STARTPRICE, BUYITNOWPRICE, RESERVEPRICE, SECONDOFFER, ITEMDESCRIPTION, DISPATCHTIME, LOCATION, PAYMENTMETHODS1, PAYMENTMETHODS2, PAYMENTMETHODS3, POSTALCODE, COUNTRY, PAYPAL, DETAIL_RETURN_PROFILE, HITCOUNTER, GALLERY, RP_RETURNSACCEPTEDOPTION, RP_REUNDOPTION, RP_RETURNSWITHINOPTION, RP_SHIPPINGCOSTPAIDBYOPTION, RP_DESCRIPTION, BRD_MBPV_COUNT, BRD_MBPV_PERIOD, BRD_MUIS_COUNT, BRD_MUIS_PERIOD, BRD_MIR_MIC, SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_ISSO1_SHIPTOLOCASTION, SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_ISSO2_SHIPTOLOCATION, SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_ISSO3_SHIPTOLOCATION, SD_SALESTAXSTATE, SD_SALESTAXPERCENT, SD_SHIPPINGTYPE, URL0, URL1, URL2, URL3, URL4, URL5 ) VALUES ('{@#guid#}', '{@#site#}', '{@#conditionid#}', '{@#listingtype#}', '{@#currency#}', '{@#productid#}', '{@#productidval#}', '{@#primarycategory#}', '{@#primarycategorytext#}', '{@#attribute#}', '{@#secondarycategory#}', '{@#secondarycategorytext#}', '{@#attribute2#}', '{@#itemtitle#}', '{@#subtitle#}', '{@#quantity#}', '{@#lotsize#}', '{@#listingduration#}', '{@#startprice#}', '{@#buyitnowprice#}', '{@#reserveprice#}', '{@#secondoffer#}', '{@#itemdescription#}', '{@#dispatchtime#}', '{@#location#}', '{@#PAYMENTMETHODS1#}', '{@#PAYMENTMETHODS2#}', '{@#PAYMENTMETHODS3#}', '{@#postalcode#}', '{@#country#}', '{@#paypal#}', '{@#detail_return_profile#}', '{@#hitcounter#}', '{@#gallery#}', '{@#RP_RETURNSACCEPTEDOPTION#}', '{@#RP_REUNDOPTION#}', '{@#RP_RETURNSWITHINOPTION#}', '{@#RP_SHIPPINGCOSTPAIDBYOPTION#}', '{@#RP_DESCRIPTION#}', '{@#BRD_MBPV_COUNT#}', '{@#BRD_MBPV_PERIOD#}', '{@#BRD_MUIS_COUNT#}', '{@#BRD_MUIS_PERIOD#}', '{@#BRD_MIR_MIC#}', '{@#SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPTOLOCASTION#}', '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPTOLOCATION#}', '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPTOLOCATION#}', '{@#SD_SALESTAXSTATE#}', '{@#SD_SALESTAXPERCENT#}', '{@#SD_SHIPPINGTYPE#}', '{@#URL0#}', '{@#URL1#}', '{@#URL2#}', '{@#URL3#}', '{@#URL4#}', '{@#URL5#}' )

UPDATE sc_ebay_template SET site = '{@#site#}' , CONDITIONID='{@#conditionid#}', listingtype = '{@#listingtype#}' , currency='{@#currency#}', quantity = '{@#quantity#}' , productid = '{@#productid#}' , productidval = '{@#productidval#}' , primarycategory = '{@#primarycategory#}' , primarycategorytext = '{@#primarycategorytext#}' , attribute = '{@#attribute#}' , secondarycategory = '{@#secondarycategory#}' , secondarycategorytext = '{@#secondarycategorytext#}' , attribute2 = '{@#attribute2#}' , itemtitle = '{@#itemtitle#}' , subtitle = '{@#subtitle#}' , lotsize = '{@#lotsize#}' , listingduration = '{@#listingduration#}' , startprice = '{@#startprice#}' , buyitnowprice = '{@#buyitnowprice#}' , reserveprice = '{@#reserveprice#}' , secondoffer = '{@#secondoffer#}' , itemdescription = '{@#itemdescription#}' , dispatchtime = '{@#dispatchtime#}' , location = '{@#location#}' , PAYMENTMETHODS1 = '{@#PAYMENTMETHODS1#}' , PAYMENTMETHODS2 = '{@#PAYMENTMETHODS2#}' , PAYMENTMETHODS3 = '{@#PAYMENTMETHODS3#}' , postalcode = '{@#postalcode#}' , country = '{@#country#}' , paypal = '{@#paypal#}' , detail_return_profile = '{@#detail_return_profile#}' , hitcounter = '{@#hitcounter#}' , gallery = '{@#gallery#}' , RP_RETURNSACCEPTEDOPTION = '{@#RP_RETURNSACCEPTEDOPTION#}' , RP_REUNDOPTION = '{@#RP_REUNDOPTION#}' , RP_RETURNSWITHINOPTION = '{@#RP_RETURNSWITHINOPTION#}' , RP_SHIPPINGCOSTPAIDBYOPTION = '{@#RP_SHIPPINGCOSTPAIDBYOPTION#}' , RP_DESCRIPTION = '{@#RP_DESCRIPTION#}' , BRD_MBPV_COUNT = '{@#BRD_MBPV_COUNT#}' , BRD_MBPV_PERIOD = '{@#BRD_MBPV_PERIOD#}' , BRD_MUIS_COUNT = '{@#BRD_MUIS_COUNT#}' , BRD_MUIS_PERIOD = '{@#BRD_MUIS_PERIOD#}' , BRD_MIR_MIC = '{@#BRD_MIR_MIC#}' , SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE = '{@#SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}' , SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST = '{@#SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}' , SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST = '{@#SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}' , SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE = '{@#SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}' , SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST = '{@#SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}' , SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST = '{@#SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}' , SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE = '{@#SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}' , SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST = '{@#SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}' , SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST = '{@#SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}' , SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE = '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}' , SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST = '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}' , SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST = '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}' , SD_ISSO1_SHIPTOLOCASTION = '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPTOLOCASTION#}' , SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE = '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}' , SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST = '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}' , SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST = '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}' , SD_ISSO2_SHIPTOLOCATION = '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPTOLOCATION#}' , SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE = '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}' , SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST = '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}' , SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST = '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}' , SD_ISSO3_SHIPTOLOCATION = '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPTOLOCATION#}' , SD_SALESTAXSTATE = '{@#SD_SALESTAXSTATE#}' , SD_SALESTAXPERCENT = '{@#SD_SALESTAXPERCENT#}' , SD_SHIPPINGTYPE = '{@#SD_SHIPPINGTYPE#}' , URL0 = '{@#URL0#}' , URL1 = '{@#URL1#}' , URL2 = '{@#URL2#}' , URL3 = '{@#URL3#}' , URL4 = '{@#URL4#}' , URL5 = '{@#URL5#}'
WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'

INSERT INTO sc_ebay_profile_logistics (ID, NAME, DISPATCHTIME, SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_ISSO1_SHIPTOLOCASTION, SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_ISSO2_SHIPTOLOCATION, SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE, SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST, SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST, SD_ISSO3_SHIPTOLOCATION, SD_SALESTAXSTATE, SD_SALESTAXPERCENT, SD_SHIPPINGTYPE ) VALUES ('{@#guid#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#dispatchtime#}', '{@#SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_SSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO1_SHIPTOLOCASTION#}', '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO2_SHIPTOLOCATION#}', '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICE#}', '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICECOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPPINGSERVICEADDITIONALCOST#}', '{@#SD_ISSO3_SHIPTOLOCATION#}', '{@#SD_SALESTAXSTATE#}', '{@#SD_SALESTAXPERCENT#}', '{@#SD_SHIPPINGTYPE#}' )

INSERT INTO sc_ebay_profile_location (ID, NAME, LOCATION, POSTALCODE, COUNTRY, RP_RETURNSACCEPTEDOPTION, RP_REUNDOPTION, RP_RETURNSWITHINOPTION, RP_SHIPPINGCOSTPAIDBYOPTION, RP_DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ('{@#guid#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#location#}', '{@#postalcode#}', '{@#country#}', '{@#RP_RETURNSACCEPTEDOPTION#}', '{@#RP_REUNDOPTION#}', '{@#RP_RETURNSWITHINOPTION#}', '{@#RP_SHIPPINGCOSTPAIDBYOPTION#}', '{@#RP_DESCRIPTION#}' )

INSERT INTO sc_ebay_profile_return (ID, NAME, PAYMENTMETHODS1, PAYMENTMETHODS2, PAYMENTMETHODS3, PAYPAL ) VALUES ('{@#guid#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#PAYMENTMETHODS1#}', '{@#PAYMENTMETHODS2#}', '{@#PAYMENTMETHODS3#}', '{@#paypal#}' )
